name: candy_world
description: A 3D world of rudimentary, but sharp graphically nature - featuring smooth, glossy shapes in a pastel candy-colored landscape.

scripts.dev: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:emcc && vite
scripts.build:wasm: asc assembly/index.ts --outFile public/candy_physics.wasm --textFile public/candy_physics.wat --sourceMap --shrinkLevel 0 --optimize --converge --optimizeLevel 3 --enable simd --enable relaxed-simd --enable bulk-memory --initialMemory 2048 --enable threads
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:emcc && npm run optimize && vite build
